item.description:
Jazz Festival

I realize that this is a day of "Double Dipping" for some of us, that is why I chose to meet for this venue for 5:00 rather than 3:00. Some may want to come down at 3:00 and enjoy the earlier performances. Bring your picnic supper, lawn chairs...and join us.

Here is what we will see:

Afro-Peruvian Jazz Showcase - 5:15
http://www.gabrielale...

Winard Harper Sextet - 6:30
http://www.winardharp...

Bobby Watson Quartet - 7:45
http://bobbywatson.co...

parking:

Below is a map with some parking garages listed in addition to the street parking. The garage next to the Shubert on College Street or the garage on Temple near the Omni Hotel are both close to the Green. The Green touches Chapel,Temple,Elm, and Church Streets to give you an idea of its radius.

I will be flying my scarf with Black and white piano keys on a pole, but also there will be another Meetup joining us, the NH wine group, they will be flying red balloons, so look for that too.

map of parking:
http://www.cityofnewh...
item.how_to_find_us: I will fly the black and white scarf with piano keys on a pole.
item.name: Jazz Festival
